trends: There has been one other sighting in Chisago City
There were no other sightings in Chisago City on or around July 4th 2009
divs: sighting detailsmy father was arriving home from a friend's house at around 11:00 pm and saw two large orange lights that seemed to be connected hovering and rotating across the lake. he ran inside and got my cousin and i to come out and check out the lights with him. the lights continued to rotate and slowly drift across the sky for about 3 minutes when they disappeared either behind a cloud or just drifted off. then, as we were walking into the house, i looked back once more and saw 3 identical lights which were in the shape of an equilateral triangle rising from the same spot as the first two lights. they did the same movements, drifted off in the same direction and also disappeared. the lights were too large\slow moving to be a plane. were in the air for far too long to be any sort of firework and generally hovered and behaved in a way that was unlike anything we'd ever seen. did anyone else see this?
